name: TAF

issueTime.description: Day and time of issue YYGGggZ in UTC (51.1.2)

cavok.description: Ceiling And Visibility OK - vis >=10km, no cloud <1500m/MSA, no CB/TCU, no sig wx

weather.description: Forecast weather w'w' - intensity/proximity + descriptor + phenomena (Code table 4678)

nsw.description: No Significant Weather - end of weather phenomena in change group

cloud.description: Cloud layer NsNsNshshshs - amount + height in 100s ft + type

verticalVisibility.description: Vertical visibility VVhshshs in 100s ft when sky obscured

nsc.description: No Significant Cloud - no cloud <1500m/MSA, no CB/TCU

tempo.description: Temporary fluctuations - changes <1h each, <50% of period (51.5)

becmg.description: Becoming - change expected at regular/irregular rate (51.4)

fm.description: From - new self-contained forecast period FMYYGGgg (51.1.4)

editable.description: Day (2 digits) + Hour (2 digits) + Minutes (2 digits)

editable.defaultsFunction: () => { const now = new Date(); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const addHours = (hours) => { const future = new Date(now.getTime() + hours * 60 * 60 * 1000); return String(future.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0') + String(future.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); }; return [{ text: d + h + '/' + addHours(6), description: '6 hours validity', type: 'datetime' }, { text: d + h + '/' + addHours(9), description: '9 hours validity', type: 'datetime' }, { text: d + h + '/' + addHours(12), description: '12 hours validity', type: 'datetime' }, { text: d + h + '/' + addHours(24), description: '24 hours validity', type: 'datetime' }, { text: d + h + '/' + addHours(30), description: '30 hours validity', type: 'datetime' }]; }

editable.description: Altitude in hundreds of feet (3 digits)
Altitude in hundreds of feet (3 digits)
Altitude in hundreds of feet (3 digits)
Altitude in hundreds of feet (3 digits)
Height in hundreds of feet (3 digits)

examples: TAF LFPG 160500Z 1606/1712 VRB02KT 0400 FG VV002 BECMG 1608/1610 4000 BR BKN010
